channel.title: In need of some guidance / accurate up to date info
channel.description:
Hi everyone! I am a new member and entirely new to creating servers. I have been playing around in the server/client download section of the forum and have got a bunch up and running but none of them really fit my interest. I want to start my own server and not exactly leech off of the other already personalized servers. So i recently got the runelocus starter kit downloaded it and set it up. I logged on and it was like a nice blank canvas :). So here are my questions
A) I would like to create custom items, npc (shops and bosses), things [like thieving stalls(with custom loot), tree locations, mining spots, bank chests or booth thing, etc] / custom teleports, and commands
B) I would like to know how to set it up so people can find, and download and connect to my server remotely (such as my friends, or random people looking for a cool server)
For now thats about all i can think up, but illl prbly have more. I hope to get some responses!!! Thanks for reading:)
